levels.description: Passive Effect: When a Welcome Mat is triggered, deals <@ba.vup>{trap_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage and <$ba.root>Binds</> the target for <@ba.vup>{constraint}</> second(s); If the target is within range, immediately attack them <@ba.vup>{times}</> times, each dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage; Active Effect: Immediately gets 1 Welcome Mat
